column5: Well, truth be told, it's actually been this cold. And.... with no end in sight. C'mon May!!!
At least we're not these guys....
Nice Cliff. Had a good laugh with that one.
Does anyone know what is behind the saying  " cold enough to freeze the balls off a brass monkey ?  Answer to follow.
Ya, actually I do know the history of that saying.
I knew it would happen one of these days !!!
Does anyone know the history about,Dick shrivels from Colwater   Im sure you will be warmed up come the Daytona 500 Dan. Sit back and hang on.
Aren't brass monkeys where cannon balls were stored on war ships?
Yes , your right. And when it got way cold the rack would shrink and the cannon balls would fall out and roll around. I am glad my truck has a block heater.
I thought the Brass Monkey was a statue outside the Ontario parliment buildings lol j/k
